context: Attempting to use getExclusionWindow function in a debug section
root_cause: getExclusionWindow was defined in scheduler.nim but not exported with '*'
solution: Added export marker '*' to getExclusionWindow in scheduler.nim
code_before: proc getExclusionWindow(contact: Contact, today: DateTime): tuple[start, endDate: DateTime] =
code_after: proc getExclusionWindow*(contact: Contact, today: DateTime): tuple[start, endDate: DateTime] =
verification: Successful compilation and run with --dry-run option
lessons: Remember to export helper functions that might be needed in other modules
Nim requires explicit export markers with '*' suffix
Recompile and verify after making export changes
